name: painika
description: An AI-powered coding assistant with client-server architecture

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:tui
scripts.build:release: bun run build:core && bun run build:release:all
scripts.build:release:all: bun run build:release:linux && bun run build:release:darwin && bun run build:release:windows
scripts.build:release:linux: cd packages/tui && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o ../../bin/painika-linux-amd64 ./main.go && GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o ../../bin/painika-linux-arm64 ./main.go
scripts.build:release:darwin: cd packages/tui && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o ../../bin/painika-darwin-amd64 ./main.go && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o ../../bin/painika-darwin-arm64 ./main.go
scripts.build:release:windows: cd packages/tui && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o ../../bin/painika-windows-amd64.exe ./main.go
